summary: A new set of 14 bows all can be crafted under a new category (works if you don't have any other modded crafting categories).  More bows will come soon!
descriptionHtml:
[COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=7]VORNS ARTILLERY[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]A brand new bow collection containing 14 new bows, all having unique meshes! All the bows can be crafted under a new crafting category called 'Traditional Bows' [/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]
[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[CENTER][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]The collection contains:[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Celtic Horker Bow[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Horker Bow[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Ancient Wooden Bow[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]5 Different Coloured Thin Bows ([/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]B[/SIZE][/FONT][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4],[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4][COLOR=#1f497d]B[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4],[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4][COLOR=#4f6128]G[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4],[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4][COLOR=#c00000]R[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4],[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4][COLOR=#b8cce4]W[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4])[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Chillrend Bow[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Distinct Glass Bow[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Blood Glass Bow[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Ancient Daedric Bow[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Bone Bow[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Spiked Bow[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]
[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Request more bows, inbox me I've run out of ideas![/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Thanks to [/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/64989/?][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Nicorshi[/SIZE][/FONT][/URL][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4] for creating 'The Bow of the DarkOne' (ancient daedric bow), to [/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2743969/?][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]VanguardVis[/SIZE][/FONT][/URL][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4] for the idea of the horker tusk bow and mesh and to the creator of the bone bow: [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5083650/?]MudCrabKing[/URL] and [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/341894/?]AlexScorpion[/URL][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]. Also a big thank you to [/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3297180/?][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Ghosu[/SIZE][/FONT][/URL][COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4] for teaching me how to make bows and pretty much mod Skyrim! [/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]
[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Permission[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]You cannot use any of the bows I have made unless you have my permission.[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]
[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Credits[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Bethesda (Skyrim and Creation Kit)[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Blender[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]GIMP[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]Mudbox[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#4bacc6][FONT=Impact][SIZE=4]All the people I listed above[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
author: MJAB98
